pageContext.claim: “I think it was a great victory. I'll be honest: I think it was a great victory. And actually, some of the news this morning was that it was, in fact, a great victory.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump may believe Republicans achieved a great victory in the 2018 midterms, but by any objective measure, losing a net 40 House seats and control of the chamber, while gaining two Senate seats on a map that favored the GOP, is a poor showing.
